name: part_003
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Shiranui Flare continue their performance of 'Seiten Galaxy Cross'.
Instrumental interlude featuring transition effects and character silhouettes.
Omaru Polka, Shiranui Flare, and Nakiri Ayame perform 'Trio Dreams'.

subtitles.original: ドキドキ 煌めき
subtitles.english: My heart's pounding, a sparkling glow,

subtitles.original: 十字となって闇を暴く
subtitles.english: Forming a cross to expose the darkness.

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けたその丘には
subtitles.english: On that hill we ran through,

subtitles.original: 神様も知らない
subtitles.english: Even the gods don't know...

subtitles.original: 歴史が光
subtitles.english: ...the light of history.

subtitles.original: 踊る My top and Brave Heart
subtitles.english: Dancing with my top and brave heart,

subtitles.original: この大きな奇跡(きずな) 星天ギャラクシィクロス
subtitles.english: This great miracle—this bond—Seiten Galaxy Cross.

subtitles.original:
Trio Dreams
作詞：大森祥子 作曲：佐藤あき子
subtitles.english:
Trio Dreams
Lyrics: Sachiko Omori / Composition: Akiko Sato

subtitles.original: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!
subtitles.english: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!

subtitles.original: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!
subtitles.english: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!

subtitles.original: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!
subtitles.english: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!

subtitles.original: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!
subtitles.english: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!

subtitles.original: ときめきで上書きした世界 未来
subtitles.english: A world and future overwritten with excitement,
1+1+1 is infinity!

subtitles.original: 唇からこぼれる歌は ラ・ラ・リラ・ラ
subtitles.english: A song spilling from our lips, la-la-lila-la,

subtitles.original: リズム眩しい光 ラ・ラ・シャ・サンシャイン
subtitles.english: A dazzling light of rhythm, la-la-sha-sunshine.

subtitles.original: 三人寄れば文殊最高 最強
subtitles.english: Three heads are better than one—the best, the strongest!

subtitles.original: 始まるただ一度のラフ＆エンジョイ トゥゲザー
subtitles.english: Starting our one-and-only Rough & Enjoy together.

subtitles.original: ハミング ジャスト オフ 完奏ね 交差レスポンス
subtitles.english: Humming, Just of, the performance is complete, a crossing response,

subtitles.original: 輝きプリデイいいよね
subtitles.english: A sparkling pre-day is great, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 好きな 好きな フレーズを
subtitles.english: Taking our favorite, favorite phrases,

subtitles.original: シンフォニーに夢をのせて
subtitles.english: Putting our dreams on a symphony,

subtitles.original: 君 あなたの元へ For you
subtitles.english: to you, to where you are, for you.

subtitles.original: もっともっと輝き合えるね
subtitles.english: We can shine together even more,

subtitles.original: みんな (Yeah! Yeah!)
subtitles.english: everyone! (Yeah! Yeah!)

subtitles.original: 瞳スクリーンにいつだって
subtitles.english: On the screen of our eyes, let's always

subtitles.original: 笑顔映し合おう
subtitles.english: reflect each other's smiles.

subtitles.original: Promise 君がいるからパワー生まれるよ 今日も
subtitles.english: Promise, because you're here, power is born, today too!

subtitles.original: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!
subtitles.english: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!

subtitles.original: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!
subtitles.english: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!

subtitles.english: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!

subtitles.original: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!
subtitles.english: Let's smile! Let's fly! Woo! PreCure!!!

subtitles.original: 一緒だから感じるハッピー ワンピ
subtitles.english: Because we're together, we feel happy, one-piece,
1×1×1 is invincible!

subtitles.original: 出し惜しみはなしで全部あげたい ラ・ラ・リラ・ラ
subtitles.english: Without holding anything back, I want to give it all, la-la-lila-la.

subtitles.original: ハプニングさえチョイス ワン・トゥー
subtitles.english: Even choosing the happenings, one-two,

subtitles.original: 三人寄れば文殊もしの 知能
subtitles.english: Three heads together, a charging wisdom,

subtitles.original: 見せるよきっと伝説のライブ アンコールちょっと
subtitles.english: We'll surely show you a legendary live, with a little encore.

subtitles.original: Jump & Hop Step Sun-Sun All welcome
subtitles.english: Jump & Hop Step, Sun-Sun, all welcome!

subtitles.original: カテゴリライズいらないね
subtitles.english: No need for categorization,

subtitles.original: 好きだ 好きだ 思いきり
subtitles.english: I love it, I love it, with all my heart!

subtitles.original: Shout & Flow 羽ひろげ
subtitles.english: Shout & Flow, spread your wings

subtitles.original: はばたこう その奥へ For you
subtitles.english: and fly deeper, for you.

subtitles.original: 命は輝きでできて
subtitles.english: Life is made of brilliance,

subtitles.original: いるの (Yeah! Yeah!)
subtitles.english: you know? (Yeah! Yeah!)

subtitles.original: ビッグスクリーンもはみ出しちゃう
subtitles.english: Spilling out of the big screen,

subtitles.original: 嬉しいや楽しい
subtitles.english: happiness and fun.

subtitles.original: Plus 君を知って 知らない自分に会えたよ
subtitles.english: Plus, knowing you, I met a version of myself I never knew.

subtitles.english: Let's sing! Let's swing! Let's dance! Let's burn!
